segments.text: I'm just watching this sink, and honestly, it's making me quite uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water has been running for ages now, just pouring out of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, flowing over the cabinets and onto the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that puddle; it's getting larger by the second, spreading across the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the water damage to those wooden cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a complete waste of water, which is quite frustrating to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still just standing there, completely unaware of the developing flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really quite disgusting to think about the grime that might be spreading with the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water soaking into the floorboards could lead to bigger problems, like mold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This messy situation is truly irritating, especially when it could easily be prevented.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before the entire kitchen is submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just such an unnecessary mess to deal with.
segments.speaker: PAR
